selection_reasoning: The selected idea offers the best balance of feasibility, impact, and learning value. It has a low implementation complexity, high expected impact, and aligns well with project goals, making it suitable for the 7-day timeline.
implementation_roadmap: Day 1: Set up the development environment and install necessary libraries.
Day 2: Implement basic OCR functionality using Python.
Day 3: Test the OCR system with various image formats.
Day 4: Optimize the processing speed to meet the 5-second requirement.
Day 5: Conduct user testing and gather feedback.
Day 6: Refine the system based on user feedback.
Day 7: Prepare documentation and finalize the PoC.
risk_mitigation: Use well-documented libraries to minimize technical risks.
Conduct regular testing to ensure accuracy and performance.
Gather user feedback early to make necessary adjustments.
success_metrics: Achieve at least 90% accuracy in text recognition.
next_steps: Begin development as per the implementation roadmap.
Set up a project management tool to track progress.
Schedule daily check-ins to address any challenges.
